name: Roast Chickens With Thyme Paste
keywords: chicken, onion, thyme, fall, main course
recipeIngredient: 1 medium Bermuda onion, peeled and chopped
Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, combine the thyme- paste ingredients. In a food processor, working in two batches, process to a fine paste.

Preheat the oven to 500 degrees. Loosen the skin over as much of the chicken as possible by running a spoon or your fingers under the skin covering the breasts of the chickens. Stuff 1/2 of the paste under the skin and in the cavity of each chicken. Season the chickens with salt and pepper.
Transfer the chickens to a large roasting pan fitted with a rack. Roast until the juices run clear when the chickens are pierced at the thickest part of the leg, about 1 hour.
